TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkLabel/Link extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 控件内的链接。

span.span: Represents a link within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义中的链接的属性控件。The class defines the properties of a link within a control. 可以使用这些属性提供数据事件的控件时控件中单击该链接时执行的任务。You can use these properties to provide data to the event of the control to perform tasks when the link is clicked in the control. 属性使您能够定义信息的事件可以使用显示在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中的 URL 或打开一个文件。The property enables you to define information that the event can use to display a URL within Microsoft Internet Explorer or to open a file. 除了与链接的属性相关的信息类还帮助定义的文本及其显示状态。In addition to information related to the link, the properties of the class also help define the text of the and its display state. 并属性定义的位置和长度的文本中的文本控件来显示为链接。The and properties define the location and length of text from the text of the control to display as a link. 属性，可将链接显示为禁用的链接，并属性可以提醒用户他们已经访问过的当前实例中的指定的链接。The property allows you to display the link as a disabled link, and the property can alert the user that they already visited the specified link in the current instance of the . 可以在单个显示多个链接控件。You can display multiple links in a single control. 每个添加到与关联控件。Each is added into the associated with the control. 若要获取的链接中定义的集合控制，请使用属性。To obtain the collection of links defined in a control, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CPP/linklabel.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/CS/linklabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel/VB/linklabel.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用链接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性来显示处于禁用状态中链接控件。You can use this property to display a link in a disabled state within the control. 当禁用链接时，单击的链接不会导致控件以引发事件。When a link is disabled, clicking on the link does not cause the control to raise the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Length { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Length : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置链接文本中的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters in the link text.

value.span: 链接文本中的字符数，包括空格。

span.span: The number of characters, including spaces, in the link text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定从文本若要显示为链接，请设置中要开始创建链接的文本的位置的属性。To specify text from the to display as a link, set the property to the location in the text to start creating the link. 之后设置属性，将其设置的值属性设置为多个字符，包括中指定的字符位置想要使链接文本的属性。After the property is set, set the value of the property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the property, that you want to make the link text. 例如，如果你想要进行链接的文本"The quick brown fox"的第一个单词，则设置属性设置为零 (0) 和属性设置为三 （3)。For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the property to zero (0) and the property to three (3).

summary.span: 获取或设置与链接关联的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the data associated with the link.
An representing the data associated with the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于提供与链接相关的信息。You can use this property to supply information related to the link. 此属性提供的信息可在事件的提供信息的链接，可用于处理正在单击的链接。The information provided by this property can be used within the event of the to provide information about the link that can be used to process the link being clicked. 例如，可以指定的值作为单击链接时在 Internet Explorer 中显示的 URL属性。For example, you can specify the URL to display in Internet Explorer when the link is clicked as the value of the property. 此外可以使用属性标识一个对话框显示当用户单击的链接。You can also use the property to identify a dialog to display when the user clicks on the link. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links. value.span: 控件的文本内链接开始的位置。

span.span: The location within the text of the control where the link starts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定从文本若要显示为链接，请设置中要开始创建链接的文本的位置的属性。To specify text from the to display as a link, set the property to the location in the text to start creating the link. 之后设置属性，将其设置的值属性设置为多个字符，包括中指定的字符位置想要使链接文本的属性。After the property is set, set the value of the property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the property, that you want to make the link text. 例如，如果你想要进行链接的文本"The quick brown fox"的第一个单词，则设置属性设置为零 (0) 和属性设置为三 （3)。For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the property to zero (0) and the property to three (3).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visited { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Visited : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否已访问过该链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user has visited the link.

value.span: 如果已经访问过该链接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link has been visited; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件不自动代表一个链接是访问过的链接。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要将链接显示为访问过的链接，可以设置此属性设置为值`true`中的事件处理程序事件的。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the event of a . 使用中指定的颜色显示访问过的链接属性的控件。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. 一次窗体包含控件已关闭，所有与链接关联的显示状态为已删除。Once the form containing the control is closed, the all display state associated with the link is deleted. 若要保留的显示状态的链接，需要在与你的应用程序相关联的注册表设置中存储的链接的显示状态。In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application. > [!NOTE] > 如果您具有一个链接中指定控件，可以使用属性的若要为已访问指定的链接。If you have only one link specified in a control, you can use the property of the to specify the link as visited. 此外可以使用属性，如果有多个链接定义，但该设置仅适用于在控件中定义的第一个链接。You can also use the property if you have multiple links defined, but the setting only applies to the first link defined in the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用类，与多个部分定义，以在窗体上显示的标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ， ，并可自定义查找范围的属性。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个使用指定的属性。The first is specified using the property. 其他链接添加到使用方法。Additional links are added to the using the method. 示例句柄启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示事件其他链接。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links.
